name: MoveToArea
description: Move to a specific area or building in the simulation world.
usage: Use this action when you need to change your location to another area or building.

parameters.name: area_name
parameters.description: The name of the target area or building to move to

examples: Moving from Living Room to Kitchen
Entering a building like Cafe, School, or Hospital
Moving between different rooms in the same building
requirements: Target area/building must be accessible from current location
Must be included in the available movable positions
whenToUse: Following a planned route or schedule
Need to access resources in another location
Want to change environment for activities
Moving to meet someone in a specific place
